name: OneForAll (itch)
description:
To right the wrongs of his past, Ol Justice must band a new group of heroes to show what it truly means to be a hero. 

Swap between 3 different heroes with their own abilities. 

More info to come! Usual Semester Game Project Deadline for VGDC is 5/01/20. We highly recommend you unzip the folder in an empty folder!
